original_text:
Oh sing to the Lord a new song,
    for he has done marvelous things!
His right hand and his holy arm
    have worked salvation for him.
korean_text: 새 노래로 여호와께 찬송하라 그는 기이한 일을 행하사 그의 오른손과 거룩한 팔로 자기를 위하여 구원을 베푸셨음이로다

sentences.original_text: Oh sing to the Lord a new song,
for he has done marvelous things!
His right hand and his holy arm
